content.heading: Personalized Learning
content.text:
Building Brainiacs is a New York based tutoring company. They specialize in elementary literacy and math tutoring and operate with over 25 at-home specialists.

Building Brainiacs

content.heading: Designing For a Small Business
content.text: Building Brainiacs was looking for a professional brand identity to complement their sophisticated tutoring methods. I built a logo that combines their primary focus of reading and writing education with a brain. Their homepage utilizes long-form marketing tactics to engage the user, showcase the value of the company, and then follow up with a call-to-action.

content.heading: Streamlined Development
content.text: The website was developed to be fast and responsive. Techniques were used to maximize page load times so that customers won't be lost due to a slow response time.
